description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8ho2v","text":"This protocol details methods for the analysis of LRRK2-Nanotube assembles by negative stained EM and Cryo-EM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"fv7ab","text":"Solutions to prepare:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cobi2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bpum","text":"Low salt buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8dua","text":"      Low salt buffer    HEPES (7.4)  20mM    NaCl  90mM    MgCl2  2.5mM    Glycerol  7%    DTT  2mM    GDP  20μM  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":115}],"data":{}},{"key":"fct7l","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0":{"0":"B"},"0_0":"","1":{"0":"_"},"1_0":"","1_1":"","2":{"0":"1"},"2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"A_5":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"A_6":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"B_5":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"B_6":{"className":"_dt-h-left"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["174.98958587646484",100],"data":[["HEPES (7.4)","20 mM"],["NaCl","90 mM"],["MgCl2","2.5 mM"],["Glycerol","7%"],["DTT","2 mM"],["GDP","20 μM"]],"guid":"781847C41F9811EDAD140A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["HEPES (7.4)","20 mM"],["NaCl","90 mM"],["MgCl2","2.5 mM"],["Glycerol","7%"],["DTT","2 mM"],["GDP","20 μM"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ci3br","text":"Prepare samples in a PCR tube with   LRKK2,   lipid nanotubes and   GMPPNP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"300","error_concentration":false,"guid":"2D8E6F001F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"20","error_concentration":false,"guid":"355EDC601F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"3D3E64F01F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tjhj","text":"Glow-discharge carbon-coated grids (25 mA,  ) during the sample incubation time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":45,"guid":"54A881201F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aobmi","text":"Place the discharged grids on a piece of parafilm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ii3a","text":"After incubation, apply   of the samples to the grid and adsorbed on the grid for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":82,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":87,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"5FB6DB701F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"6365D9B01F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6A337D101F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1ne8","text":"Blot the grid with filter paper and stained with 2% uranyl acetate for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":40,"guid":"7059E3F01F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6q03p","text":"Collect images using a Talos L 120C TEM microscope at 80 kV with Velox software and a 4k × 4K Ceta CMOS camera (Thermo Fisher Scientific).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fce1b","text":"Dialyze freshly purified LRRK2 into the Low salt buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"62b8v","text":"After dialysis, incubate LRRK2 ( ) with the kinase inhibitor MLi-2 ( ) for    .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":68,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":77,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"872CA2201F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"923FB7601F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"9FAB14801F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A22403C01F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"csh4b","text":"Add   lipid nanotubes into the mixture above and further incubate for   at   in the presence of   GTP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":70,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":96,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ij32","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"17rf3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"20","error_concentration":false,"guid":"C82097F01F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"D15CCA501F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D5EB2C101F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"DA505AF01F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"4":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":41}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"7fggr","text":"Note: The total volume of the mixture is  .","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"12","error":false,"guid":"C18353601F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fch6a","text":"Glow-discharge C-flat™ holey carbon gold grids (CF-1.2/1.3-3Au) (15mA,  ) during the sample incubation time, then place the discharged grids on a piece of parafilm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":45,"guid":"EE459BB01F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"be8c","text":"After incubation, apply   of the samples to the grid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"F839FA801F9911ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ufte","text":"Plunge-freeze sample-loaded grids in liquid ethane-propane mixture using a Vitrobot Mark IV (FEI) with the following parameters: blot force, 0; blot time,  ; wait time,  ; drain time,  ; humidity, 100%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":155,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":169,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":184,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1,"guid":"0607C2F01F9A11ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"089684201F9A11ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"0CD16EB01F9A11ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"diqmr","text":"Collect cryo-EM micrographs on a Titan Krios transmission electron microscope (Thermo Fisher Scientific) operating at 300 kV, equipped with a post column GIF quantum energy filter and a Gatan K3 Summit DED camera (Gatan, Pleasanton, CA, USA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bahdj","text":"Perform the data collection with the SerialEM software. Record movies in super-resolution mode with a physical pixel size of 1.098 A˚ (super-resolution pixel size is 0.549 A˚) and a defocus range of -  to -  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":200,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":207,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cr3pq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"44vvl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"3C3B7E701F9A11ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"1"}},"1":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"454EF3201F9A11ED8D84613C82E6DA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"3"}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":110},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":112}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8miap","text":"The total dose of ~60.6 e− Å−2 was attained by using a dose rate of ~23.5 e− pixel−1 s−1 across 43 frames for     total exposure time. The initial drift and beam-induced motions was corrected using MotionCor2.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"duration":120,"guid":"2DCB1299223811ED8AB30A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"duration"},"1":{"data":{"duration":58,"guid":"2DCB1300223811ED8AB30A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"duration"}}}}}}
